title: Donovan Mitchell on the Move?
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss why the Jazz are now taking trade offers for Donovan Mitchell. Then GM Jalen weighs a mock trade off from the Raptors for Kevin Durant. And what was Kevin Durant getting at when he went off on Twitter about “legacy”? LeBron is cooking up some offseason motivation. Does he really have any true haters? PLUS, Gronk says he’s retired for real this time… Jalen tells us why he believes him now. All that and more.
